Posts.Content: Hi, I had my 1st Taxotere, which went ok, but then I became Neutropenic and had to go into hospital for 4 days. my mouth felt vile, no taste, inside of nose became dry too. My finger are itchy but no rash. Im due for my 2nd Tax on Tues as long as my platelets have returned to safe limits, and will be having Herceptin so have to be at hospital for 6 hours. I also had Fec T initially.   xxx
Posts.Title: 2nd Taxotere tomorow

Posts.Content: Hi, is there anyone currently having Herceptin with Taxotere, I'm due to have in 2 weeks. Any hints tips etc appreciated, side effects.....  How long have you been on the Herceptin for, or how long in remission after Herceptin has stopped. I have a 2cm breast cancer, primary in axilla, following chemo, I am due to have surgery then radiotherapy. many thanks
Posts.Title: Herceptin and Taxotere

Posts.Content: Hi. Im recovering from HER2+breast cancer, had FecT and Docetaxel chemo, surgery and am now continuing with Herceptin til November. Side effects are fatigue, pain in joints and muscles and low mood. Is there anyone out there who has had similar who can let me know their timeframe of when these side effects wear off, months, years after treatment stops? I also have M.E. as well which is making things worse. Many thanks x
Posts.Title: How Long For Side Effects To Wear Off?
How Long For Side Effects To Wear Off?
